name: n8n-whatsapp-bot
description: SaaS Multi-Tenant con n8n, Telegram Bot, DeepSeek AI Agent, y MCP Server
author: Kike

scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.dev: docker compose up -d --build postgres redis n8n-main n8n-worker pgadmin && bash scripts/post-docker-setup.sh && docker compose up -d backend mcp-server frontend
scripts.dev:fresh: docker compose down --volumes --remove-orphans && docker compose up -d --build postgres redis n8n-main n8n-worker pgadmin && bash scripts/post-docker-setup.sh && docker compose up -d backend mcp-server frontend
scripts.logs:all: docker compose logs -f backend frontend mcp-server
scripts.clean: docker compose down --volumes --remove-orphans && docker system prune -f
scripts.clean:data: docker compose down --volumes --remove-orphans && sudo rm -rf ./data/postgres ./data/n8n ./data/pgadmin ./data/redis && docker system prune -f
scripts.clean:tables: docker exec postgres_db psql -U admin -d postgres -c "DELETE FROM chatbot_credentials; DELETE FROM chatbot_config; DELETE FROM citas; DELETE FROM servicios_profesionales; DELETE FROM bloqueos_horarios; DELETE FROM horarios_profesionales; DELETE FROM servicios; DELETE FROM profesionales; DELETE FROM clientes; DELETE FROM usuarios; DELETE FROM historial_subscripciones; DELETE FROM subscripciones; DELETE FROM organizaciones; DELETE FROM metricas_uso_organizacion; SELECT 'Tablas limpiadas' as status;"
scripts.fresh:clean: npm run clean:data && docker compose up -d --build postgres redis n8n-main n8n-worker pgadmin && bash scripts/post-docker-setup.sh && docker compose up -d backend mcp-server frontend
scripts.backup:db: docker exec postgres_db pg_dumpall -U admin > backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql
scripts.db:connect: docker exec -it postgres_db psql -U admin -d postgres
scripts.test:backend:watch: docker exec -it back npm run test:watch
scripts.test:backend:coverage: docker exec back npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:prepare: npm run fresh:clean && echo '⏳ Esperando a que la BD esté lista...' && sleep 15
scripts.test:full: npm run test:prepare && npm run test:backend
scripts.mcp:rebuild: docker compose build --no-cache mcp-server && docker compose up -d mcp-server
scripts.frontend:rebuild: docker compose build --no-cache frontend && docker compose up -d frontend
